pointVector& rc_Spline::points (  )  [inline]

accessor to the vector of control points

Normaly used for iterating, e.g. for(pointVectorIter iter = pSpline->start(); iter != pSpline->end(); iter++) { Vec3f curpt = *iter; // do whatever is needed with each point }
